title: If I see a Muslim sister doing something haram, how do I stop her ? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: abdah from Russia if I see a Muslim sister committing in a Haram action or going towards a Haram action by following the steps of thean how should I stop her ask your wife to give her a reminder and advise her or ask your sister or speak to her brother speak to her father don't speak to her directly because this opens the doors of shatan for both of you
